plot: The BNN-crew travels around the world to do jobs you don't find in The Netherlands. From Europe to Australia to Canada, they do reports on special places and happenings.
plot_en: The BNN-crew travels around the world to do jobs you don't find in The Netherlands. From Europe to Australia to Canada, they do reports on special places and happenings.
plot_es: The BNN-crew travels around the world to do jobs you don't find in The Netherlands. From Europe to Australia to Canada, they do reports on special places and happenings.
title: BNN at Work
